name: Innogru
description: Innoguru offers different approaches to Strategy Formation, depending on the situation at the start, the level of uncertainty and the area of uncertainties.

Headline: Your Coaching Specialist For Middle Managers
ShortDescription: Innoguru offers different approaches to Strategy Formation, depending on the situation at the start and the level of uncertainty

Highlights.name: DEI-Dare2Share
Highlights.description: The Great Balancing Act – Strengthen the organisations’ diversity stance with specialised coaching for women manager

Highlights.name: Innovative DC (Development Center)
Highlights.description: Put Development back into DCs – Create an impactful change in a safe environment

Highlights.name: SPRINT Coaching
Highlights.description: Coaching Your Future Leaders does not have to be a Marathon- Maximise time-efficiency with succinct coaching journeys

enhanced_description: Innogru specializes in providing coaching solutions tailored for middle managers, focusing on accelerating skill development and improving learning efficiency. The service offers customized, time-efficient, and impactful coaching journeys designed to facilitate strategy formation, even in situations with high uncertainty. Key offerings include specialized coaching for women managers to strengthen diversity initiatives, innovative development centers for impactful change in a safe environment, and SPRINT Coaching for future leaders, emphasizing maximum time-efficiency through succinct coaching.
competitive_advantages: Facilitates impactful change in a safe environment
Tailored approaches to strategy formation based on uncertainty levels
Includes specialized coaching programs for women managers
